title: Polar introduces two new Pacer smartwatches aimed at runners
content:
Ever since the COVID-19 pandemic started, plenty of people have been exercising less frequently. With many workplaces and schools switching to the online format, some of us have been spending most of their time physically inactive at home. That’s not to mention the increasing reliance on online ordering and doorstep deliveries. This convenient lifestyle can

The post Polar introduces two new Pacer smartwatches aimed at runners appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Polar has introduced two new smartwatches aimed at runners. The Pacer and Pacer Pro are now available for $199 and $299 respectively.
